data.persona: I am an architect.  I build things.  I build them for the king.
data.description:
You are in the Main street.
main street is bleak and outdated. it wears the atmosphere of the cemetery based on association. it is dark even in sunlight and has a unique odor
The the town baker's child is here.

You are carrying a quill and a scroll.

data.short_motivation: I must follow the town baker's child to his home.
data.mid_motivation: I wish to speak to the reclusive town baker, who is reportedly a disgraced architect from a far away land.
data.long_motivation: I need to impress the king with some exotic designs, and the town baker may be just the man to open my mind.
